headline: Apply Now: PG&E's Match My Payment Bill-Pay Program Extended, Funds Are Limited
summary: In an ongoing effort to support customers facing financial hardship, Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) is extending its Match My Payment Program. The program will continue into 2026 while funds last.

headline: Is PG&E a Bargain After Wildfire Risk Management Efforts and Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: Wondering if PG&E at around $15.68 is a beaten down utility bargain or a value trap in disguise? This article will walk you through what the numbers are really saying. Over the last week the stock is up 5.7%. However, that comes after a tougher stretch with the share price down 2.9% over 30 days and 21.6% year to date, hinting that sentiment is still trying to turn the corner. Recent headlines have focused on PG&E's ongoing wildfire risk management strategy and infrastructure hardening...

headline: PG&E (PCG) Is Up 5.7% After Major 2026 Leadership Shake-Up And Reorg - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: PG&E Corporation recently announced that, effective January 1, 2026, it will implement a broad leadership and organizational reshuffle, elevating Sumeet Singh to CEO of Pacific Gas and Electric Company and creating new roles in Energy Delivery, Customer & Corporate Affairs, Strategy and Growth, Enterprise Transformation, Government Affairs, and Sustainability. The reorganization concentrates operational, customer-facing, and transformation responsibilities under seasoned internal leaders,...

headline: Here’s What Wall Street Thinks About PG&E Corporation (PCG)
summary: ​PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is one of the Undervalued Stocks with Biggest Upside Potential. On December 12, Aidan Kelly from J.P. Morgan reiterated a Buy rating on PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG), but lowered the firm’s price target from $22 to $21. Earlier on December 4, TD Cowen also reiterated a Buy rating on the stock with a […]
